subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of the Central Statistical Office (CSO)?
question_hi: कलेक्टरल स्टीटीज़ी ऑफिस के रूप क्या है?
A_en: CSO is responsible for collecting, compiling, and publishing economic and social data.

question_en: What is the role of the Central Statistical Office (CSO)?
A_en: CSO is an agency under the Ministry of Statistics and Data Analytics that collects, processes and publishes economic and social data.
explanation_en: The CSO is responsible for collecting and analyzing economic and social data for various departments.
The CSO conducts surveys and provides data to different government agencies.
